channel.title: Slow clock on Whonix-Gateway makes Tor fail
channel.description:
Hi, the clock on my Whonix-Gateway is slower than my host's which makes the connection to TOR fail once the time differences gets too big. Resetting it manually like the wiki suggest fixes it but I am looking for an automatic solution....
I thought sdwdate was supposed to query the correct hour from servers?
Thanks. :slight_smile:
